definition: Data is either state- or county-level. Location is based on residence, not occurrence of event.
Year in which incident occurred. Due to statistical stability and small cell size concerns, county-level data is in 3-year aggregates.
General demographic category under which responses have been stratified.
Individual strata within a demographic category.
Population at risk, taken from California Department of Finance projections.
Number of incidents per 100,000 population at risk.
For explanation of Age Adjusted Rate, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Age_adjustment
